title: The Demon’s Menu - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Conditional Power   Game Elements   Gunfighters   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   System Administrator   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   World Hopping
author: Rusty Dragon   颓废龙
description: When the night came, there was a twittering sound in his ears, and the monster in the shadows began to move restlessly. Jason’s hungry stomach began to roar, and he couldn’t help swallow his saliva. Hunger was the best spur.>
